text.div:
Preferred Specimen/Attribute Status

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
A AlternateThis is a specimen that is acceptable as a replacement for a preferred specimen. In the following field (OM4-17), the sequence number of the preferred specimen must be messaged.added v2.8
P PreferredThis specimen is Preferred for all attributes (Container and Additive) identified in the OM4 segment.added v2.8

name: v2 Preferred Specimen/Attribute Status
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0920 ( Preferred Specimen/Attribute Status)

extension.valueString: This is a specimen that is acceptable as a replacement for a preferred specimen.  In the following field (OM4-17), the sequence number of the preferred specimen must be messaged.
This specimen is Preferred for all attributes (Container and Additive) identified in the OM4 segment.
